patthana2.10:1.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:2.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:3.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ
patthana2.10:4.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:4.1_1: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:5.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca sārammaṇā khandhā.
patthana2.10:6.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammo uppajjanti hetupaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca sārammaṇā khandhā,
patthana2.10:7.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe sārammaṇaṁ
patthana2.10:7.1_1: ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:8.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sārammaṇe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:9.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana2.10:9.1_1: sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:9.1_3: sārammaṇe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:10.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:11.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca sārammaṇā khandhā.
patthana2.10:12.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana2.10:12.1_1: sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:14.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:14.1_3: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:15.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetuke sārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:16.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ sārammaṇaṁ
patthana2.10:16.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:17.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:18.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca sārammaṇā khandhā.
patthana2.10:19.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca sārammaṇā khandhā,
patthana2.10:20.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana2.10:20.1_1: sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:21.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetuke sārammaṇe
patthana2.10:21.1_1: khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:22.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana2.10:22.1_1: sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:22.1_3: sārammaṇe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:23.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā— sārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:24.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (Yāva asaññasattā.)
patthana2.10:25.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—sārammaṇe khandhe
patthana2.10:25.1_1: ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:28.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… sahajāte nava …pe… magge ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.10:30.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Paṭiccasadisā.)
patthana2.10:31.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:31.1_1: mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:32.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā sārammaṇā khandhā;
patthana2.10:33.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā sārammaṇā khandhā,
patthana2.10:34.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:35.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paccayā anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sārammaṇe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:36.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—sārammaṇaṁ
patthana2.10:36.1_1: ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:36.1_3: sārammaṇe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:37.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:38.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:39.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṁ
patthana2.10:39.1_1: ekaṁ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:39.1_4: sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:41.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
patthana2.10:42.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:43.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:44.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā ahetukā sārammaṇā khandhā,
patthana2.10:45.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṁ
patthana2.10:45.1_1: ekaṁ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:45.1_4: ahetukaṁ sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:45.1_7: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:46.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paccayā anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetuke sārammaṇe
patthana2.10:46.1_1: khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:47.1_0: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ
patthana2.10:47.1_1: sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:47.1_3: ahetuke sārammaṇe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:47.1_4: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe ahetukaṁ sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:47.1_6: ahetuke sārammaṇe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā kaṭattārūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:52.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:53.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ (sabbattha ekaṁ), avigate ekaṁ.
patthana2.10:55.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ sārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:55.1_2: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe saṁsaṭṭho vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:58.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.10:59.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—sārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:60.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—sārammaṇā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:61.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa ca anārammaṇassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—sārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana2.10:62.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:62.1_2: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati,
patthana2.10:63.1_0: Anārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā nibbānaṁ paccavekkhanti,
patthana2.10:64.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana2.10:64.1_4: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati,
patthana2.10:64.1_11: sārammaṇe khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati,
patthana2.10:65.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:66.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa ca anārammaṇassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:66.1_1: Sahajātādhipati—sārammaṇādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:67.1_0: Anārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:68.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā sārammaṇā …pe…
patthana2.10:69.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana2.10:70.1_0: Anārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana2.10:71.1_0: Anārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana2.10:72.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … ekaṁ.
patthana2.10:73.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo … ekaṁ.
patthana2.10:74.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā,
patthana2.10:74.1_2: Sahajātā—sārammaṇā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:74.1_4: Nānākkhaṇikā—sārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:75.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā,
patthana2.10:75.1_2: Sahajātā—sārammaṇā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:76.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa ca anārammaṇassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā,
patthana2.10:76.1_2: Sahajātā—sārammaṇā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:76.1_4: Nānākkhaṇikā—sārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:77.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:78.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:79.1_0: Anārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:80.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:81.1_0: Anārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo— rūpajīvitindriyaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:82.1_0: Anārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo— cakkhundriyaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe…
patthana2.10:83.1_0: Sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā sārammaṇassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—cakkhundriyañca cakkhuviññāṇañca
patthana2.10:83.1_2: kāyindriyañca kāyaviññāṇañca kāyaviññāṇasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:84.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa jhānapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi,
patthana2.10:85.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:86.1_0: Anārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:86.1_2: Sahajātaṁ—paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu sārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:87.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sārammaṇo eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:88.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:89.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa ca anārammaṇassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:90.1_0: Anārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:91.1_0: Anārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:91.1_2: Sahajātaṁ—paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu sārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:92.1_0: Sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā sārammaṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:92.1_2: Sahajāto—cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:92.1_4: kāyaviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca kāyāyatanañca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:92.1_6: sārammaṇo eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:93.1_0: Sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā anārammaṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:93.1_2: Sahajātā—sārammaṇā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:93.1_4: Pacchājātā—sārammaṇā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:93.1_5: Pacchājātā—sārammaṇā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:95.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:96.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:97.1_0: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa ca anārammaṇassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:98.1_0: Anārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:99.1_0: Anārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:100.1_0: Sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā sārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:101.1_0: Sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā anārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:106.1_0: Cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:106.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:107.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:107.1_1: dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:108.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nocitte khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:109.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca citto ca nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā— nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca
patthana2.10:109.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:109.1_4: dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho cittañca kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:109.1_5: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:110.1_0: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca
patthana2.10:110.1_3: cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:110.1_4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:110.1_6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca vatthuñca paṭicca nocittā khandhā;
patthana2.10:110.1_7: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:111.1_0: Cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:112.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:113.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca citto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—nocitte khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:114.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca citto ca nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca,
patthana2.10:114.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca,
patthana2.10:114.1_4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:115.1_0: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:115.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca vatthuñca paṭicca nocittā khandhā.
patthana2.10:117.1_0: Cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:117.1_2: vicikicchāsahagataṁ uddhaccasahagataṁ cittaṁ paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.

patthana2.10:118.1_3: (yāva asaññasattā) vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.

patthana2.10:121.1_1: cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:121.1_3: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:121.1_5: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca vatthuñca paṭicca nocittā khandhā,
patthana2.10:121.1_6: vicikicchāsahagataṁ uddhaccasahagataṁ cittañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.

patthana2.10:146.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā citto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—nocitte khandhe paccayā cittaṁ,

patthana2.10:147.1_2: vatthuṁ paccayā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā;
patthana2.10:147.1_4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paccayā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā,

patthana2.10:150.1_2: vicikicchāsahagataṁ uddhaccasahagataṁ cittaṁ paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.

patthana2.10:151.1_6: vatthuṁ paccayā ahetukā nocittā khandhā vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.

patthana2.10:157.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe pañca, anantare pañca (sabbattha pañca), magge tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana2.10:160.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:161.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nocitte khandhe saṁsaṭṭhaṁ cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:162.1_0: Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho citto ca nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā— nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā cittañca,
patthana2.10:163.1_0: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— nocittaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:164.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca (sabbattha pañca), avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:166.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi sabbe kātabbā.
patthana2.10:167.1_0: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—nocittā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:168.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—nocittā hetū cittassa hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:169.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— nocittā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana2.10:169.1_1: khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:170.1_0: Citto dhammo cittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—cittaṁ ārabbha cittaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:170.1_1: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Cittaṁ ārabbha nocittā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:170.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Cittaṁ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:171.1_0: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ …pe…

patthana2.10:172.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā …pe…
patthana2.10:173.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— dānaṁ datvā …pe…

patthana2.10:176.1_0: Citto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana2.10:176.1_2: Ārammaṇādhipati—cittaṁ garuṁ katvā nocittā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:176.1_3: Sahajātādhipati—cittādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:177.1_0: Citto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:177.1_1: Ārammaṇādhipati—cittaṁ garuṁ katvā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:178.1_0: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana2.10:178.1_4: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati,
patthana2.10:178.1_9: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana2.10:178.1_16: vatthuṁ nocitte khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati,
patthana2.10:178.1_19: Sahajātādhipati—nocittādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:179.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:180.1_0: Citto ca nocitto ca dhammā cittassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:181.1_0: Citto dhammo cittassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimaṁ purimaṁ cittaṁ pacchimassa pacchimassa cittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:182.1_0: Citto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimaṁ purimaṁ cittaṁ pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ
patthana2.10:183.1_0: Citto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimaṁ purimaṁ cittaṁ pacchimassa
patthana2.10:183.1_1: pacchimassa cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:184.1_0: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā nocittā khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:185.1_0: Citto ca nocitto ca dhammā cittassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimaṁ purimaṁ cittañca sampayuttakā
patthana2.10:185.1_1: ca khandhā pacchimassa pacchimassa cittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:185.1_2: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Purimaṁ purimaṁ cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ nocittānaṁ
patthana2.10:185.1_3: khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo—cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:185.1_4: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Purimaṁ purimaṁ cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimassa pacchimassa cittassa
patthana2.10:187.1_0: Citto dhammo cittassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana2.10:188.1_0: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana2.10:189.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:190.1_0: Citto ca nocitto ca dhammā cittassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana2.10:190.1_3: Pakatūpanissayo—cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā cittassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:191.1_0: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana2.10:192.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana2.10:193.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana2.10:193.1_9: Vatthupurejātaṁ—cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:193.1_11: vatthu cittassa ca sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:194.1_0: Citto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:195.1_0: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:196.1_0: Citto ca nocitto ca dhammā nocittassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:197.1_0: Citto dhammo cittassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.10:198.1_0: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā,
patthana2.10:198.1_2: Sahajātā—nocittā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:198.1_4: Nānākkhaṇikā—nocittā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:199.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā,
patthana2.10:199.1_4: Nānākkhaṇikā—nocittā cetanā vipākassa cittassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:200.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā,
patthana2.10:200.1_2: Sahajātā—nocittā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:200.1_4: Nānākkhaṇikā—nocittā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:201.1_0: Citto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … pañca …
patthana2.10:201.1_3: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa jhānapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi …
patthana2.10:202.1_0: Citto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:203.1_0: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:203.1_3: Sahajātā—nocittā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:203.1_10: Pacchājātā—nocittā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:204.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:205.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:205.1_2: Sahajātaṁ—paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:205.1_3: Purejātaṁ—cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:205.1_5: vatthu cittassa ca sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:206.1_0: Citto ca nocitto ca dhammā nocittassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:207.1_0: Citto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:208.1_0: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:209.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:210.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:210.1_2: Sahajāto—nocitto eko khandho dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:210.1_4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:211.1_0: Citto ca nocitto ca dhammā nocittassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:211.1_3: Sahajāto—nocitto eko khandho ca cittañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:211.1_5: Sahajātaṁ—cittañca vatthuñca nocittānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo (paṭisandhikkhaṇepi dve).
patthana2.10:211.1_6: Sahajātaṁ—cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:211.1_7: Sahajātaṁ—cittañca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo (paṭisandhikkhaṇepi dve).
patthana2.10:211.1_8: Pacchājātaṁ—cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:211.1_9: Pacchājātaṁ—cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:211.1_10: Pacchājātaṁ—cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:213.1_0: Citto dhammo cittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:214.1_0: Citto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:215.1_0: Citto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:216.1_0: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:217.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:218.1_0: Nocitto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:219.1_0: Citto ca nocitto ca dhammā cittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:220.1_0: Citto ca nocitto ca dhammā nocittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:221.1_0: Citto ca nocitto ca dhammā cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:222.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.10:224.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava. (Anulomamātikā kātabbā.)
patthana2.10:226.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:227.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cetasike khandhe paṭicca cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:227.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasike khandhe paṭicca cittañca kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:228.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ
patthana2.10:228.1_1: paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:229.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:229.1_5: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:230.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:231.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:231.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:232.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:232.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:232.1_4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:233.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cetasike khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:233.1_1: cetasike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:233.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasike khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:233.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:233.1_4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasike khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:234.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cetasikaṁ
patthana2.10:234.1_1: ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:234.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:234.1_5: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca,
patthana2.10:234.1_6: dve khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca eko khandho cittañca.
patthana2.10:235.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:236.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cetasike khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:237.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca,
patthana2.10:238.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:239.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:240.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana2.10:240.1_1: vatthuṁ paṭicca cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:241.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:241.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:241.1_4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:242.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasike khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:243.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana2.10:243.1_1: cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca,
patthana2.10:244.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:246.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:246.1_3: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:247.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetuke cetasike khandhe paṭicca cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:248.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cetasikaṁ
patthana2.10:248.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:249.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:250.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:250.1_3: vicikicchāsahagataṁ uddhaccasahagataṁ cittaṁ paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:251.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittaṁ paṭicca
patthana2.10:251.1_2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:251.1_3: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:252.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:252.1_2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:252.1_4: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:252.1_6: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:253.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetuke cetasike khandhe
patthana2.10:253.1_2: ahetuke cetasike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:253.1_3: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasike khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:253.1_4: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:253.1_5: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasike khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:254.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ
patthana2.10:254.1_1: cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:254.1_2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:254.1_3: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca,
patthana2.10:255.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā— cetasike khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:256.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā— cittaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:257.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—cetasike khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:257.1_1: cetasike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:262.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Paṭiccasadisā.)
patthana2.10:263.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:264.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā,
patthana2.10:265.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:265.1_1: vatthuṁ paccayā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:266.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paccayā cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:266.1_2: cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:267.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paccayā acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cetasike khandhe ca cittañca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:267.1_1: cetasike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:267.1_2: cetasike khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:268.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paccayā cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cetasikaṁ
patthana2.10:268.1_1: ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:268.1_3: cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā cittañca,
patthana2.10:269.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cetasiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi. (Paṭiccasadisā.)
patthana2.10:270.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā acetasiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:271.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cetasiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:272.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā
patthana2.10:272.1_3: vatthuṁ paccayā cittaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:273.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paccayā cetasiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṁ
patthana2.10:273.1_1: ekaṁ khandhañca cakkhuviññāṇañca paccayā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:273.1_3: cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:273.1_6: cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:273.1_8: cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:274.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paccayā acetasiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagate
patthana2.10:274.1_3: cetasike khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:275.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ paccayā cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṁ
patthana2.10:275.1_1: ekaṁ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā dve khandhā cakkhuviññāṇañca,
patthana2.10:275.1_3: cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā cittañca,
patthana2.10:277.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cetasiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cetasikaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:278.1_0: (Nava pañhā pañcaviññāṇampi yathā ārammaṇapaccayā evaṁ kātabbaṁ,
patthana2.10:281.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, anantare nava (sabbattha nava), magge tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.10:283.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:284.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cetasiko khandhe saṁsaṭṭhaṁ cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:285.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā— cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā cittañca,
patthana2.10:286.1_0: Acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:287.1_0: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cetasikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:288.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca (sabbattha pañca), avigate pañca.
patthana2.10:289.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cetasiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.10:291.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.10:292.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—cetasikā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:293.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—cetasikā hetū cittassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:294.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—cetasikā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana2.10:294.1_1: khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:295.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—cetasike khandhe ārabbha cetasikā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:295.1_1: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Cetasike khandhe ārabbha cittaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:295.1_2: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Cetasike khandhe ārabbha cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:296.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā …pe…
patthana2.10:297.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā …pe…
patthana2.10:298.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā …pe…
patthana2.10:298.1_5: taṁ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:298.1_7: rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:299.1_0: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā cetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—cetasike khandhe ca cittañca ārabbha cetasikā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:299.1_1: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Cetasike khandhe ca cittañca ārabbha cittaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:299.1_2: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Cetasike khandhe ca cittañca ārabbha cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:300.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana2.10:300.1_2: Ārammaṇādhipati—cetasike khandhe garuṁ katvā cetasikā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:300.1_4: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Ārammaṇādhipati—cetasike khandhe garuṁ katvā cittaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:300.1_5: Sahajātādhipati—cetasikādhipati cittassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:300.1_6: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Ārammaṇādhipati—cetasike khandhe garuṁ katvā cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:300.1_7: Sahajātādhipati—cetasikādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:301.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana2.10:301.1_8: vatthuṁ acetasike khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati,
patthana2.10:302.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana2.10:302.1_6: vatthuṁ acetasike khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati,
patthana2.10:303.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana2.10:303.1_4: (paṭhamagamanaṁ) acetasike khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati,
patthana2.10:303.1_5: taṁ garuṁ katvā cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:303.1_6: Sahajātādhipati—acetasikādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:304.1_0: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā cetasikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:305.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā cetasikā khandhā pacchimānaṁ
patthana2.10:305.1_2: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Purimā purimā cetasikā khandhā pacchimassa pacchimassa cittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:305.1_3: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Purimā purimā cetasikā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ cetasikānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:306.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimaṁ purimaṁ cittaṁ pacchimassa pacchimassa cittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:307.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:308.1_0: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā cetasikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:310.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana2.10:310.1_3: Pakatūpanissayo—cetasikā khandhā cetasikānaṁ khandhānaṁ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:310.1_5: tīṇi upanissayā.) Cetasikā khandhā cittassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:310.1_7: tīṇi upanissayā.) Cetasikā khandhā cetasikānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:311.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana2.10:312.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana2.10:313.1_0: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā cetasikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:314.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana2.10:315.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana2.10:316.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana2.10:316.1_5: taṁ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:316.1_12: vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:317.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:318.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:319.1_0: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā acetasikassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:320.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:321.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā,
patthana2.10:321.1_2: Sahajātā—cetasikā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:321.1_4: Nānākkhaṇikā—cetasikā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:322.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā,
patthana2.10:322.1_2: Sahajātā—cetasikā cetanā cittassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:322.1_4: Nānākkhaṇikā—cetasikā cetanā vipākassa cittassa kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:323.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā,
patthana2.10:323.1_2: Sahajātā—cetasikā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:323.1_4: Nānākkhaṇikā—cetasikā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:324.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … nava …
patthana2.10:325.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:326.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:326.1_10: Pacchājātaṁ—cittaṁ purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:327.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:327.1_2: Sahajātaṁ—paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cetasikānaṁ khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:328.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:328.1_2: Sahajātaṁ—paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cetasikānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:328.1_5: vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:329.1_0: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā acetasikassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:330.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo … ekaṁ. (Paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
patthana2.10:331.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.10:332.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo … ekaṁ.
patthana2.10:333.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:334.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:334.1_4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cetasikānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:335.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:335.1_2: Sahajātaṁ—cittaṁ sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:335.1_4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cetasikānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:336.1_0: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā cetasikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:336.1_2: Sahajāto—cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:336.1_4: cetasiko eko khandho ca vatthu ca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:336.1_6: Sahajāto—cetasiko eko khandho ca cittañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:337.1_0: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā acetasikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:337.1_5: cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:337.1_6: cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:337.1_7: Sahajātā—cetasikā khandhā ca vatthu ca cittassa atthipaccayena paccayo (paṭisandhikkhaṇe tīṇipi kātabbā).
patthana2.10:337.1_8: Pacchājātā—cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:337.1_9: Pacchājātā—cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:337.1_10: Pacchājātā—cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:338.1_0: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:338.1_2: Sahajāto—cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:338.1_3: kāyaviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca kāyāyatanañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:338.1_5: Sahajāto—cetasiko eko khandho ca vatthu ca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:341.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:342.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:343.1_0: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:344.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:345.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:346.1_0: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:347.1_0: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā cetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:348.1_0: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā acetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:349.1_0: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:350.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.10:352.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (anulomamātikā kātabbā) …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.10:354.1_0: Cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittasampayuttaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:355.1_0: Cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittasampayutte khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:356.1_0: Cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittasampayuttaṁ
patthana2.10:356.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:357.1_0: Cittavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:358.1_0: Cittavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittasampayuttakā khandhā.
patthana2.10:359.1_0: Cittavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana2.10:360.1_0: Cittasampayuttañca cittavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana2.10:360.1_1: cittasampayuttaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:361.1_0: Cittasampayuttañca cittavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasampayutte
patthana2.10:361.1_1: khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:361.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasampayutte khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:362.1_0: Cittasampayuttañca cittavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana2.10:362.1_1: hetupaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasampayuttaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:362.1_3: cittasampayutte khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:363.1_0: Cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cittasampayuttaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:364.1_0: Cittavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittasampayuttakā khandhā.
patthana2.10:365.1_0: Cittasampayuttañca cittavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana2.10:365.1_1: cittasampayuttaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:367.1_0: Cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:367.1_3: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:368.1_0: (Evaṁ navapi pañhā kātabbā. Ahetukanti sabbattha niyāmetabbaṁ, ekaṁyeva mohaṁ mūlapade.)
patthana2.10:369.1_0: Cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—cittasampayutte khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:370.1_0: Cittavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe….
patthana2.10:371.1_0: Cittasampayuttañca cittavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—cittasampayutte
patthana2.10:371.1_1: khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:376.1_0: Cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:377.1_0: Cittavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana2.10:378.1_0: Cittavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— vatthuṁ paccayā cittasampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:379.1_0: Cittavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā cittasampayuttakā khandhā,
patthana2.10:380.1_0: Cittasampayuttañca cittavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paccayā cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasampayuttaṁ
patthana2.10:380.1_1: ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:381.1_0: Cittasampayuttañca cittavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paccayā cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasampayutte
patthana2.10:381.1_1: khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:382.1_0: Cittasampayuttañca cittavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paccayā cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana2.10:382.1_1: hetupaccayā—cittasampayuttaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:382.1_3: cittasampayutte khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:383.1_0: Cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana2.10:384.1_0: Cittavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:385.1_0: Cittasampayuttañca cittavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paccayā cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṁ
patthana2.10:385.1_1: ekaṁ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:385.1_3: kāyaviññāṇasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca kāyāyatanañca paccayā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:385.1_5: cittasampayuttaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:387.1_0: Cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:388.1_0: Cittavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe….
patthana2.10:389.1_0: Cittavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:390.1_0: Cittavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—vatthuṁ
patthana2.10:391.1_0: Cittasampayuttañca cittavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paccayā cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṁ
patthana2.10:391.1_1: ekaṁ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:391.1_3: kāyaviññāṇasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca kāyāyatanañca paccayā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:391.1_5: ahetukaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:391.1_8: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:394.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… magge tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.10:396.1_0: Cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasampayuttaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:397.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ (sabbattha ekaṁ), avigate ekaṁ.
patthana2.10:399.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.10:400.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— cittasampayuttā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:401.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— cittasampayuttā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:402.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa ca cittavippayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—cittasampayuttā
patthana2.10:402.1_1: hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:403.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— dānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:403.1_2: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati,
patthana2.10:404.1_0: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— ariyā nibbānaṁ paccavekkhanti.
patthana2.10:405.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana2.10:405.1_4: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati,
patthana2.10:405.1_9: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti,
patthana2.10:405.1_11: cittasampayutte khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati,
patthana2.10:406.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:407.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa ca cittavippayuttassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:407.1_1: Sahajātādhipati—cittasampayuttādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:408.1_0: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:408.1_6: vatthuṁ cittavippayutte khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati,
patthana2.10:409.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā cittasampayuttā khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:410.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana2.10:411.1_0: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana2.10:412.1_0: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana2.10:413.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo (saṅkhittaṁ) ekaṁ,
patthana2.10:414.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā,
patthana2.10:414.1_2: Sahajātā—cittasampayuttā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:414.1_4: Nānākkhaṇikā—cittasampayuttā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:415.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā,
patthana2.10:415.1_2: Sahajātā—cittasampayuttā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:416.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa ca cittavippayuttassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā,
patthana2.10:416.1_2: Sahajātā—cittasampayuttā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:416.1_4: Nānākkhaṇikā—cittasampayuttā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:417.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:418.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:419.1_0: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo— kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:420.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:421.1_0: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo— rūpajīvitindriyaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:422.1_0: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo— cakkhundriyaṁ cakkhuviññāṇasahagatānaṁ
patthana2.10:423.1_0: Cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā cittasampayuttassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—cakkhundriyañca
patthana2.10:423.1_3: kāyindriyañca dukkhindriyañca kāyaviññāṇasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:424.1_0: Jhānapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … maggapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … ekaṁ.
patthana2.10:425.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:426.1_0: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:426.1_2: Sahajātaṁ—paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cittasampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:427.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo … ekaṁ. (Paṭiccasadisaṁ.)
patthana2.10:428.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:429.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa ca cittavippayuttassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:430.1_0: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.10:431.1_0: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:431.1_2: Sahajātaṁ—paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cittasampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:432.1_0: Cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā cittasampayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:432.1_2: Sahajāto—cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:432.1_3: kāyaviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca kāyāyatanañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:432.1_4: cittasampayutto eko khandho ca vatthu ca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:433.1_0: Cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā cittavippayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:433.1_2: Sahajātā—cittasampayuttā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:433.1_4: Pacchājātā—cittasampayuttakā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:433.1_5: Pacchājātā—cittasampayuttakā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:436.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:437.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:438.1_0: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa ca cittavippayuttassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:439.1_0: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:440.1_0: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:441.1_0: Cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā cittasampayuttassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.10:442.1_0: Cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā cittavippayuttassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:445.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri (anulomamātikā kātabbā) …pe… avigate satta.
patthana2.10:447.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:448.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittavisaṁsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittasaṁsaṭṭhe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:451.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ
patthana2.10:451.1_1: khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:451.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:452.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:452.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:453.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ
patthana2.10:453.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,

patthana2.10:455.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:456.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe

patthana2.10:456.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā.

patthana2.10:457.1_1: ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:457.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:457.1_5: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā,

patthana2.10:458.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca cittaṁ.

patthana2.10:459.1_1: uppajjanti hetupaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā
patthana2.10:459.1_4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca,

patthana2.10:467.1_1: cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca cittaṁ.

patthana2.10:468.1_1: uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca,
patthana2.10:471.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ

patthana2.10:471.1_7: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.

patthana2.10:475.1_4: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.

patthana2.10:494.1_1: ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā,

patthana2.10:496.1_1: uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā cittañca,

patthana2.10:501.1_1: ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:501.1_3: cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā,
