patthana2.10:502.1_3: cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:503.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā
patthana2.10:503.1_1: uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā dve khandhā
patthana2.10:503.1_5: cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā cittañca,
patthana2.10:504.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
patthana2.10:505.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.10:507.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi nissayavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.10:508.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:509.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe saṁsaṭṭhaṁ cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:510.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ
patthana2.10:510.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā cittañca,
patthana2.10:511.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhā sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:512.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ
patthana2.10:512.1_1: ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:513.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca (sabbattha pañca), avigate pañca.
patthana2.10:514.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.10:516.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.10:517.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— cittasamuṭṭhānā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana2.10:518.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— cittasamuṭṭhānā hetū cittassa hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:518.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānā hetū cittassa kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:519.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—cittasamuṭṭhānā
patthana2.10:519.1_1: hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:520.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ārabbha cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:520.1_1: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ārabbha cittaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:520.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ārabbha cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca cittañca uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:521.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti,
patthana2.10:522.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā …pe…
patthana2.10:523.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā …pe…
patthana2.10:523.1_4: taṁ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:524.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:525.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana2.10:525.1_2: Ārammaṇādhipati—cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe garuṁ katvā cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:525.1_3: Sahajātādhipati—cittasamuṭṭhānādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:526.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:526.1_3: nocittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati,
patthana2.10:527.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana2.10:527.1_4: nocittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati,
patthana2.10:527.1_7: Sahajātādhipati—nocittasamuṭṭhānādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:528.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:529.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:530.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:531.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimaṁ purimaṁ cittaṁ pacchimassa pacchimassa …pe…
patthana2.10:531.1_1: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:532.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo (tīṇi kātabbā,
patthana2.10:533.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo (paṭiccavārasadisaṁ) …
patthana2.10:534.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana2.10:535.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana2.10:536.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana2.10:537.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana2.10:537.1_8: senāsanaṁ cittaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:538.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana2.10:539.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:540.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:541.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:541.1_4: taṁ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:541.1_7: Rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:542.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana2.10:543.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana2.10:544.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana2.10:544.1_4: taṁ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:544.1_11: vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:545.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana2.10:545.1_3: cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca kāyāyatanañca kāyaviññāṇasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:545.1_4: cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpāyatanañca vatthu ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:546.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana2.10:546.1_3: cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca kāyāyatanañca kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:546.1_4: cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpāyatanañca vatthu ca cittassa purejātapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:547.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana2.10:547.1_2: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpāyatanañca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:547.1_4: cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpāyatanañca vatthu ca cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:548.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—pacchājātā cittasamuṭṭhānā
patthana2.10:548.1_1: khandhā purejātassa imassa cittasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo (iminākāreneva pacchājāto
patthana2.10:549.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā,
patthana2.10:549.1_2: Sahajātā—cittasamuṭṭhānā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:549.1_4: Nānākkhaṇikā—cittasamuṭṭhānā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:550.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā,
patthana2.10:550.1_4: Nānākkhaṇikā—cittasamuṭṭhānā cetanā vipākassa cittassa kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:551.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā,
patthana2.10:551.1_2: Sahajātā—cittasamuṭṭhānā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:551.1_4: Nānākkhaṇikā—cittasamuṭṭhānā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:552.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.10:553.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo— cittasamuṭṭhānā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana2.10:553.1_3: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Cittasamuṭṭhānā āhārā cittassa āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:553.1_5: cittasamuṭṭhāno kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa nocittasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:553.1_6: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Cittasamuṭṭhānā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:554.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittasamuṭṭhānā
patthana2.10:554.1_2: nocittasamuṭṭhāno kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa nocittasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:554.1_3: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Nocittasamuṭṭhānā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:554.1_5: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittasamuṭṭhānā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:555.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—cittasamuṭṭhānā
patthana2.10:555.1_1: ca nocittasamuṭṭhānā ca āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:555.1_3: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānā ca nocittasamuṭṭhānā ca āhārā kaṭattārūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:555.1_4: cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa nocittasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:555.1_5: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānā ca nocittasamuṭṭhānā ca āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:556.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:557.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittasamuṭṭhānā
patthana2.10:557.1_6: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Nocittasamuṭṭhānā indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:557.1_10: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittasamuṭṭhānā indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:558.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—cittasamuṭṭhānā
patthana2.10:558.1_1: ca nocittasamuṭṭhānā ca indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:558.1_5: kāyindriyañca dukkhindriyañca kāyaviññāṇasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:558.1_6: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānā ca nocittasamuṭṭhānā ca indriyā kaṭattārūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:558.1_9: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānā ca nocittasamuṭṭhānā ca indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana2.10:558.1_11: cakkhundriyañca upekkhindriyañca cakkhuviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:560.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:561.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:562.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:563.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:563.1_3: Sahajātaṁ—paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ kaṭattā rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo,
patthana2.10:563.1_9: Pacchājātā—nocittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā purejātassa imassa nocittasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:564.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:565.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:566.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:567.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:568.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:569.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:570.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:571.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:572.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:573.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:574.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:575.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:576.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:576.1_3: Sahajātā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā ca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:576.1_6: (paccayavārasadisaṁ paṭisandhipi pavattipi kātabbā sabbesampi pañhānaṁ.) Pacchājātā—cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā
patthana2.10:576.1_7: ca cittañca purejātassa imassa nocittasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:576.1_8: Pacchājātā—cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca cittañca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa nocittasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:576.1_9: Pacchājātā—cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca cittañca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:577.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:578.1_0: Natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:581.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:582.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:583.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:584.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:585.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:586.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:587.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:588.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:589.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:590.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.10:592.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (anulomagaṇanā kātabbā) …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.10:594.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ
patthana2.10:594.1_1: paṭicca dve khandhā cittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:594.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:595.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittasahabhū khandhe paṭicca
patthana2.10:595.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhū khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:596.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittasahabhuṁ
patthana2.10:596.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasahabhu ca nocittasahabhu ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:596.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:597.1_0: Nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittaṁ paṭicca nocittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:597.1_5: mahābhūte paṭicca nocittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:598.1_0: Nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:598.1_3: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:599.1_0: Nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittaṁ
patthana2.10:599.1_1: paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasahabhu ca nocittasahabhu ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:599.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:599.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā,
patthana2.10:599.1_4: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasahabhu ca nocittasahabhu ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:600.1_0: Cittasahabhuñca nocittasahabhuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasahabhuṁ
patthana2.10:600.1_1: ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:600.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:600.1_5: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:600.1_7: cittasahabhū khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:601.1_0: Cittasahabhuñca nocittasahabhuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasahabhū
patthana2.10:601.1_1: khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca nocittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:601.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhū khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:601.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhū khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca cittaṁ,
patthana2.10:601.1_4: cittasahabhū khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca nocittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:602.1_0: Cittasahabhuñca nocittasahabhuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana2.10:602.1_1: hetupaccayā—cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasahabhu ca nocittasahabhu
patthana2.10:602.1_4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:602.1_6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca,
patthana2.10:602.1_8: cittasahabhū khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:603.1_2: Cittasamuṭṭhānadukasadisaṁ.) Adhipatiyā nava (mahābhūtā chasupi pañhesu kātabbā,
patthana2.10:604.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ
patthana2.10:604.1_1: khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:604.1_4: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:604.1_8: Tīṇi moho yathā cittasamuṭṭhānaduke evameva kātabbā.)
patthana2.10:605.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— cittasahabhū khandhe paṭicca cittasahabhū cetanā.
patthana2.10:606.1_0: Nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—bāhiraṁ …
patthana2.10:607.1_0: Nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā.
patthana2.10:608.1_0: Cittasahabhuñca nocittasahabhuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—cittasahabhū
patthana2.10:608.1_1: khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā.
patthana2.10:609.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā— pañcaviññāṇasahagataṁ …pe….
patthana2.10:613.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Paṭiccasadisā.)
patthana2.10:614.1_0: Nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— vatthuṁ paccayā cittaṁ,
patthana2.10:615.1_0: Nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittaṁ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā cittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:616.1_0: Nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittaṁ
patthana2.10:616.1_1: paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā cittasahabhu ca nocittasahabhu ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:616.1_2: vatthuṁ paccayā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā;
patthana2.10:617.1_0: Cittasahabhuñca nocittasahabhuñca dhammaṁ paccayā cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasahabhuṁ
patthana2.10:617.1_1: ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā cittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:617.1_3: cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:618.1_0: Cittasahabhuñca nocittasahabhuñca dhammaṁ paccayā nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasahabhū
patthana2.10:618.1_1: khandhe ca cittañca paccayā nocittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:618.1_2: cittasahabhū khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:618.1_3: Cittasahabhū khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā nocittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:619.1_0: Cittasahabhuñca nocittasahabhuñca dhammaṁ paccayā cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana2.10:619.1_1: hetupaccayā—cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā cittasahabhu ca nocittasahabhu
patthana2.10:619.1_3: cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā cittañca,
patthana2.10:620.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:621.1_0: Nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā …pe…
patthana2.10:622.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
patthana2.10:623.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ …pe….
patthana2.10:626.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, anantare nava (sabbattha nava), magge tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.10:628.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittasahabhuṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:629.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittasahabhū khandhe saṁsaṭṭhaṁ cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:630.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittasahabhuṁ
patthana2.10:630.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā cittañca,
patthana2.10:631.1_0: Nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:632.1_0: Cittasahabhuñca nocittasahabhuñca dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasahabhuṁ
patthana2.10:632.1_1: ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:633.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca (sabbattha pañca), avigate pañca.
patthana2.10:636.1_0: Itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi sabbaṁ kātabbaṁ.
patthana2.10:637.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— cittasahabhū hetū sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana2.10:637.1_1: khandhānaṁ cittasahabhūnaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:638.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— cittasahabhū hetū cittassa nocittasahabhūnaṁ
patthana2.10:638.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhū hetū cittassa kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:639.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:639.1_1: cittasahabhū hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasahabhūnañca nocittasahabhūnañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:640.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.10:641.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:642.1_0: Nocittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:643.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:644.1_0: Nocittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana2.10:645.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo— pacchājātā cittasahabhū
patthana2.10:645.1_1: khandhā purejātassa imassa nocittasahabhussa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:646.1_0: Nocittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo …pe….
patthana2.10:647.1_0: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā nocittasahabhussa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo (saṅkhittaṁ) …
patthana2.10:648.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā,
patthana2.10:648.1_2: Sahajātā—cittasahabhū cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasahabhūnaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:648.1_4: Nānākkhaṇikā—cittasahabhū cetanā vipākānaṁ cittasahabhūnaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:649.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā,
patthana2.10:649.1_2: Sahajātā—cittasahabhū cetanā cittassa nocittasahabhūnaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:649.1_4: Nānākkhaṇikā—cittasahabhū cetanā vipākassa cittassa kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:650.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā,
patthana2.10:650.1_2: Sahajātā—cittasahabhū cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasahabhūnañca nocittasahabhūnañca
patthana2.10:650.1_5: Nānākkhaṇikā—cittasahabhū cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:651.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo (cittasamuṭṭhānadukasadisaṁ) …
patthana2.10:651.1_2: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:652.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:652.1_1: Sahajātā—cittasahabhū khandhā cittasahabhūnaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:653.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:653.1_2: Sahajātā—cittasahabhū khandhā nocittasahabhūnaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:653.1_4: Pacchājātā—cittasahabhū khandhā purejātassa imassa nocittasahabhussa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:654.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:654.1_1: Sahajātā—cittasahabhū khandhā cittasahabhūnañca nocittasahabhūnañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:655.1_0: Nocittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:655.1_3: Sahajātaṁ—cittaṁ nocittasahabhūnaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:655.1_10: Pacchājātaṁ—cittaṁ purejātassa imassa nocittasahabhussa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:656.1_0: Nocittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:656.1_2: Sahajātaṁ—cittaṁ cittasahabhūnaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:657.1_0: Nocittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:657.1_2: Sahajātaṁ—cittaṁ cittasahabhūnañca nocittasahabhūnañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:657.1_4: Vatthupurejātaṁ—cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:657.1_6: vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:658.1_0: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā cittasahabhussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:658.1_1: Sahajātā—cittasahabhū khandhā ca cittañca cittasahabhūnaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:659.1_0: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā nocittasahabhussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:659.1_2: Sahajātā—cittasahabhū khandhā ca cittañca nocittasahabhūnaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:659.1_4: Pacchājātā—cittasahabhū khandhā ca cittañca purejātassa imassa nocittasahabhussa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:660.1_0: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena
patthana2.10:660.1_1: paccayo—cittasahabhū khandhā ca cittañca cittasahabhūnañca nocittasahabhūnañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ
patthana2.10:661.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— cittasahabhū eko khandho …pe….
patthana2.10:662.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:663.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—cittasahabhū eko khandho …pe….
patthana2.10:664.1_0: Nocittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:665.1_0: Nocittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:666.1_0: Nocittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:667.1_0: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā cittasahabhussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:667.1_2: Sahajāto—cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:668.1_0: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā nocittasahabhussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:668.1_3: Sahajātā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:668.1_5: cittasahabhū khandhā ca cittañca nocittasahabhūnaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:668.1_6: Sahajātā—cittasahabhū khandhā ca vatthu ca cittassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:668.1_7: Sahajātā—cittasahabhū khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca nocittasahabhūnaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo (paṭisandhikkhaṇe tīṇipi kātabbā).
patthana2.10:668.1_8: Pacchājātā—cittasahabhū khandhā ca cittañca purejātassa imassa nocittasahabhussa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:668.1_9: Pacchājātā—cittasahabhū khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa nocittasahabhussa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:668.1_10: Pacchājātā—cittasahabhū khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:669.1_0: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:669.1_2: Sahajāto—cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanaṁ ca …pe….
patthana2.10:672.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:673.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:674.1_0: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:675.1_0: Nocittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:676.1_0: Nocittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:677.1_0: Nocittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:678.1_0: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā cittasahabhussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:679.1_0: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā nocittasahabhussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:680.1_0: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:681.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.10:683.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava. (Anulomamātikā kātabbā.)
patthana2.10:685.1_0: Cittānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittānuparivattiṁ ekaṁ
patthana2.10:685.1_1: khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittānuparivattiṁ cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:687.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ
patthana2.10:688.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne
patthana2.10:688.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:689.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā
patthana2.10:689.1_1: uppajjanti hetupaccayā— cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:690.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:690.1_5: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:691.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:692.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca
patthana2.10:692.1_1: dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:692.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:692.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:693.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo
patthana2.10:693.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:693.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:693.1_5: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:694.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:694.1_2: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:694.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:694.1_4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:694.1_5: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:695.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca
patthana2.10:695.1_1: nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca
patthana2.10:695.1_2: cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:695.1_4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:695.1_6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca,
patthana2.10:698.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ
patthana2.10:698.1_1: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:698.1_4: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:699.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetuke
patthana2.10:699.1_1: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:700.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā
patthana2.10:700.1_1: uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca
patthana2.10:701.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:702.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:702.1_3: vicikicchāsahagataṁ uddhaccasahagataṁ cittaṁ paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:703.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca
patthana2.10:703.1_1: dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:703.1_2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:703.1_3: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:704.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo
patthana2.10:704.1_1: uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:704.1_4: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:704.1_6: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:705.1_1: dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetuke cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:705.1_2: ahetuke cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:705.1_3: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:705.1_4: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:705.1_5: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:706.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca
patthana2.10:706.1_1: nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ
patthana2.10:706.1_2: khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:707.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne
patthana2.10:708.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:709.1_1: dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā— cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:709.1_2: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:714.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (saṅkhittaṁ) tīṇi.
patthana2.10:715.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:716.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā,
patthana2.10:716.1_1: vatthuṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā (paṭisandhikkhaṇe dvepi kātabbā) tīṇi.
patthana2.10:717.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo
patthana2.10:717.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:717.1_3: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:718.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca cittañca paccayā nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:718.1_2: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:718.1_3: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:719.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca
patthana2.10:719.1_1: nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca
patthana2.10:719.1_2: cittañca paccayā dve khandhā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:719.1_4: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā cittañca,
patthana2.10:720.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:721.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:722.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhāyatanaṁ
patthana2.10:723.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca
patthana2.10:723.1_1: dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:723.1_3: vatthuṁ paccayā cittaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:724.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo
patthana2.10:724.1_1: uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇañca paccayā
patthana2.10:724.1_5: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:724.1_7: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:725.1_1: dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— cakkhuviññāṇasahagate khandhe ca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:725.1_3: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā cittaṁ.
patthana2.10:726.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca
patthana2.10:726.1_1: nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca
patthana2.10:727.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
patthana2.10:728.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.10:731.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ
patthana2.10:732.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:733.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca
patthana2.10:733.1_1: dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā— cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā cittañca,
patthana2.10:734.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:735.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:736.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca (sabbattha pañca), avigate pañca.
patthana2.10:737.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.10:739.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.10:740.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā
patthana2.10:740.1_3: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā hetū cittassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:740.1_5: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:741.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne
patthana2.10:741.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ārabbha cittaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:741.1_3: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:742.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti …pe…
patthana2.10:743.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana2.10:744.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana2.10:745.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati.
patthana2.10:746.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo (navapi pañhā cittasahabhūdukasadisā) …
patthana2.10:747.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana2.10:748.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo (cittasahabhūdukasadisā,
patthana2.10:749.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:750.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:751.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:752.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:752.1_2: Sahajātaṁ—paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānaṁ khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:753.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:753.1_2: Sahajātaṁ—paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:753.1_3: Purejātaṁ—cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:753.1_5: vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:754.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:755.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo (paṭiccasadisā).
patthana2.10:755.1_1: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:755.1_3: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:756.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:757.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:757.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo,
patthana2.10:757.1_4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:758.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:758.1_2: Sahajātaṁ—cittaṁ sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:758.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo,
patthana2.10:758.1_4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:759.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:759.1_2: Sahajāto—cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhuviññāṇañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:759.1_4: cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:759.1_7: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno eko khandho ca cittañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo,
patthana2.10:759.1_9: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno eko khandho ca vatthu ca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:760.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:760.1_3: Sahajātā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā ca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:760.1_5: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca cittañca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo,
patthana2.10:760.1_6: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo,
patthana2.10:760.1_7: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca vatthu ca cittassa atthipaccayena paccayo (paṭisandhikkhaṇe tīṇi kātabbā).
patthana2.10:760.1_8: Pacchājātā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca cittañca purejātassa imassa nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:760.1_9: Pacchājātā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca cittañca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:760.1_10: Pacchājātā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca cittañca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:761.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa
patthana2.10:761.1_3: Sahajāto—cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo,
patthana2.10:761.1_6: Sahajāto—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno eko khandho ca cittañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo,
patthana2.10:761.1_8: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno eko khandho ca vatthu ca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo,
patthana2.10:764.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:765.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:766.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:767.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:768.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:769.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:770.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:771.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:772.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa
patthana2.10:773.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.10:775.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava. (Sabbattha nava, anulomamātikā.)
patthana2.10:777.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ
patthana2.10:779.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivatti dhammo uppajjati
patthana2.10:781.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca ajjhattikaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:782.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:782.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā bāhiraṁ kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:783.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ
patthana2.10:783.1_1: paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:784.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:784.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā bāhiraṁ kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:784.1_7: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:785.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—bāhire khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:785.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhire khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ ajjhattikaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:786.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā— bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ
patthana2.10:786.1_1: paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:786.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:786.1_5: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:787.1_0: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca
patthana2.10:787.1_1: sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca ajjhattikaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:788.1_0: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca
patthana2.10:788.1_1: cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:788.1_3: cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:788.1_4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā bāhiraṁ kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:788.1_6: cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca bāhiraṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:788.1_7: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca vatthuñca paṭicca bāhirā khandhā.
patthana2.10:789.1_0: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana2.10:789.1_1: bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:790.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:791.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:792.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—bāhire khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:793.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca,
patthana2.10:793.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca,
patthana2.10:793.1_4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:794.1_0: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:794.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:794.1_4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:796.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca ajjhattikaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:797.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:797.1_1: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā bāhiraṁ kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:797.1_2: vicikicchāsahagataṁ uddhaccasahagataṁ cittaṁ paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:798.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana2.10:798.1_1: cittaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:799.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:799.1_3: (yāva asaññasattā) vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:800.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetuke bāhire khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:800.1_1: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhire khandhe paṭicca cittaṁ ajjhattikaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:801.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ bāhiraṁ ekaṁ
patthana2.10:801.1_1: khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:801.1_3: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:801.1_4: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca cittaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:802.1_0: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana2.10:802.1_1: cittañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca ajjhattikaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:803.1_0: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ bāhiraṁ ekaṁ
patthana2.10:803.1_1: khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:803.1_3: ahetukaṁ cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:803.1_4: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā bāhiraṁ kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:803.1_5: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca bāhiraṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:803.1_6: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca vatthuñca paṭicca bāhirā khandhā,
patthana2.10:803.1_7: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:804.1_0: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana2.10:804.1_1: bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:805.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā— paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca ajjhattikaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:806.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:807.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti naārammaṇapaccayā;
patthana2.10:807.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paṭicca ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:808.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—bāhire khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:808.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhire khandhe paṭicca bāhiraṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:809.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā— paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhire khandhe paṭicca ajjhattikaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:810.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti naārammaṇapaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana2.10:810.1_1: bāhire khandhe paṭicca ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṁ.

patthana2.10:811.1_1: cittañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca ajjhattikaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ.

patthana2.10:812.1_1: cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.

patthana2.10:813.1_1: cittañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṁ.

patthana2.10:815.1_9: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā cakkhuviññāṇañca,

patthana2.10:816.1_1: ekaṁ khandhañca cakkhuviññāṇañca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:821.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Paṭiccasadisā.)

patthana2.10:822.1_3: yāva ajjhattikā mahābhūtā) vatthuṁ paccayā bāhirā khandhā.

patthana2.10:822.1_9: vatthuṁ paccayā cittaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā.

patthana2.10:823.1_1: sampayuttake ca khandhe paccayā ajjhattikaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:823.1_2: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paccayā bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca
patthana2.10:823.1_5: cittañca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ,

patthana2.10:824.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:824.1_2: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā bāhiro dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇañca paccayā cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:824.1_6: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā— cakkhāyatanaṁ
patthana2.10:825.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā bāhiro dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:825.1_4: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—bāhire khandhe paccayā cittaṁ,
patthana2.10:825.1_6: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:826.1_0: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagate
patthana2.10:827.1_0: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paccayā bāhiro dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṁ
patthana2.10:827.1_1: ekaṁ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇañca paccayā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:827.1_4: bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:827.1_6: cittañca vatthuñca paccayā bāhirā khandhā (paṭisandhikkhaṇe dvepi kātabbā).
patthana2.10:827.1_7: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṁ
patthana2.10:827.1_8: ekaṁ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā dve khandhā cakkhuviññāṇañca,
patthana2.10:829.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ paccayā ajjhattikaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ,
patthana2.10:831.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi nissayavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.10:832.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.10:833.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:833.1_3: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—bāhire khandhe saṁsaṭṭhaṁ cittaṁ;
patthana2.10:833.1_5: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā cittañca,
patthana2.10:834.1_0: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— bāhiraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca cittañca saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā,
patthana2.10:835.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho bāhiro dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.10:837.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.10:838.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—bāhirā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca
patthana2.10:838.1_1: rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo— paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhirā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ bāhirānañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ
patthana2.10:839.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—bāhirā hetū cittassa hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:839.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhirā hetū cittassa ajjhattikānañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:840.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— bāhirā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana2.10:840.1_1: khandhānaṁ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:840.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhirā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittassa ca ajjhattikānañca bāhirānañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:841.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—cittaṁ ārabbha cittaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:841.1_1: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Cittaṁ ārabbha bāhirā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:841.1_2: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Cittaṁ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.

patthana2.10:856.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,

patthana2.10:861.1_5: taṁ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā khandhā ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:861.1_8: Vatthupurejātaṁ—vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:862.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,

patthana2.10:863.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā bāhirassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana2.10:863.1_2: Cakkhāyatanañca vatthu ca bāhirānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:863.1_3: kāyāyatanañca vatthu ca bāhirānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:863.1_4: rūpāyatanañca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:863.1_5: phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca kāyāyatanañca kāyaviññāṇasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:864.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,

patthana2.10:865.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Pacchājātā ajjhattikā khandhā purejātassa imassa bāhirassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:865.1_3: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Pacchājātā ajjhattikā khandhā purejātassa imassa ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca kāyassa
patthana2.10:866.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā,

patthana2.10:866.1_4: Nānākkhaṇikā—bāhirā cetanā vipākānaṁ bāhirānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.10:890.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:890.1_3: Sahajātā—bāhirā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:890.1_8: Pacchājātā—bāhirā khandhā purejātassa imassa bāhirassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:891.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:891.1_3: Sahajātā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhirā khandhā ajjhattikānaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:891.1_6: Pacchājātā—bāhirā khandhā purejātassa imassa ajjhattikassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:892.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:893.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:893.1_2: Sahajātā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattikā ca bāhirā ca khandhā ajjhattikānaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:894.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā bāhirassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:895.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:895.1_2: Sahajātā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattikā ca bāhirā ca khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:896.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:896.1_3: Sahajātaṁ—paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṁ ajjhattikānaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:897.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:897.1_3: Sahajātaṁ—sahajātā ajjhattikā khandhā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:899.1_0: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:900.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:901.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:902.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:903.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:903.1_3: Sahajātā—cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā ca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:903.1_5: paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattikā ca bāhirā ca khandhā ajjhattikānaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:903.1_6: Purejātaṁ—cakkhāyatanañca vatthu ca cittassa atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.10:903.1_7: kāyāyatanañca vatthu ca cittassa atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:903.1_10: Pacchājātā—ajjhattikā ca bāhirā ca khandhā purejātassa imassa ajjhattikassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:903.1_11: Pacchājātā—ajjhattikā ca bāhirā ca khandhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa ajjhattikassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:903.1_12: Pacchājātā—ajjhattikā ca bāhirā ca khandhā rūpajīvitindriyañca ajjhattikānaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:904.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā bāhirassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.10:904.1_3: Sahajāto—cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇañca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe….
patthana2.10:905.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,

patthana2.10:906.1_0: Natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.10:914.1_0: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …

patthana2.10:916.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā bāhirassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:917.1_0: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:918.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.10:920.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (anulomamātikā kātabbā) …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.10:922.1_0: Upādā dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca noupādā khandhā.
patthana2.10:923.1_0: Noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—noupādā ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:923.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe noupādā ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā noupādā ca kaṭattārūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:924.1_0: Noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca upādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—noupādā khandhe paṭicca upādā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.10:924.1_2: mahābhūte paṭicca upādā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana2.10:925.1_0: Noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca upādā ca noupādā ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā— noupādā ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca
patthana2.10:925.1_1: tayo khandhā upādā ca noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:926.1_0: Upādā ca noupādā ca dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— paṭisandhikkhaṇe noupādā ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā,
patthana2.10:927.1_0: Upādā dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca noupādā khandhā.
patthana2.10:928.1_0: Noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—noupādā ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.10:929.1_0: Upādā ca noupādā ca dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— paṭisandhikkhaṇe noupādā
patthana2.10:929.1_1: ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana2.10:932.1_0: Noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca upādā ca noupādā ca dhammā uppajjanti adhipatipaccayā— noupādā ekaṁ khandhaṁ
patthana2.10:932.1_1: paṭicca tayo khandhā upādā ca noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ …pe…

patthana2.10:935.1_0: Noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā—noupādā ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana2.10:937.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā vatthu ca …pe…

patthana2.10:938.1_1: ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana2.10:941.1_0: Noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ noupādā ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca
patthana2.10:941.1_1: tayo khandhā noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.10:941.1_5: asaññasattānaṁ ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā …pe…
patthana2.10:941.1_7: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.

patthana2.10:943.1_1: paṭicca tayo khandhā upādā ca noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ …pe…

patthana2.10:944.1_1: ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana2.10:945.1_3: (yāva asaññasattā) dve mahābhūte paṭicca dve mahābhūtā.

patthana2.10:946.1_2: mahābhūte paṭicca upādā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.

patthana2.10:949.1_0: Noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—noupādā khandhe paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā;
patthana2.10:950.1_0: Noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca upādā dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—bāhire āhārasamuṭṭhāne utusamuṭṭhāne mahābhūte paṭicca upādārūpaṁ.

patthana2.10:951.1_1: utusamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā upādā ca rūpaṁ …pe…

patthana2.10:961.1_0: Noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca upādā ca noupādā ca dhammā uppajjanti najhānapaccayā— bāhiraṁ āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ
patthana2.10:961.1_1: utusamuṭṭhānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā …pe…
patthana2.10:962.1_0: Upādā dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati namaggapaccayā pañca … nasampayuttapaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana2.10:965.1_0: Noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca upādā ca noupādā ca dhammā uppajjanti navippayuttapaccayā—bāhiraṁ āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ
patthana2.10:965.1_1: utusamuṭṭhānaṁ ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā upādā ca rūpaṁ …pe…
